s.sd: Grants protection against the effects of poison.
s.s1: Reduces the duration of poison by 30%.
s.s2: Reduces the duration of poison by 60%.

s.sd: Reduces the duration of paralysis.
s.s1: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
s.s2: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

s.sd: Reduces the duration of sleep.
s.s1: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
s.s2: Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

s.sd: Reduces stun duration.
s.s1: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
s.s2: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

s.sd: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.
s.s1: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

s.sd: Grants protection against blastblight.
s.s1: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
s.s2: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

s.sd: Grants protection against bleeding.
Grants protection against Defense Down.
s.s1: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 30%,
s.s2: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 60%.

s.sd: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
s.s1: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
s.s2: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
s.s4: Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
s.s5: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

s.sd: Grants protection against wind pressure.
s.s1: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
s.s2: Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
s.s4: Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
s.s5: Negates minor and major wind pressure.

s.sd: Grants protection against ground tremors.
s.s2: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
s.s3: Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

s.sd: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.
s.s1: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

s.sd: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.
s.s1: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

s.sd: Nullifies damage from heat.
Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.
Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.
Increases health.
Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).
s.s1: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
s.s2: Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
s.s3: Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

s.sd: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Grants protection against all elemental blights.
s.s1: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 30%.
s.s2: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 60%.

s.sd: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.
s.s1: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

s.sd: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.
s.s1: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

s.sd: Increases the attack power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.
s.s1: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

s.sd: Allows you to apply poison coatings.
Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.
Allows you to apply sleep coatings.
Allows you to apply blast coatings.
Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
s.s1: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
s.s2: Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for many ammo.
s.s3: Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for most ammo.

s.sd: Increases affinity.
Increases the damage of critical hits.
s.s1: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
s.s2: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
s.s3: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

s.sd: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.
s.s1: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
s.s2: Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
s.s3: Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

s.sd: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
s.s1: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
s.s2: Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
s.s3: Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

s.sd: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.
Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.
Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.
Makes it easier to stun monsters.
Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.
Makes it easier to mount monsters.
s.s1: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

s.sd: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.
Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
s.s1: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
s.s2: While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
s.s3: While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
s.s4: While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
s.s5: While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

s.sd: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.
s.s1: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 3%.
s.s2: While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 6%.
s.s3: While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 9%.
s.s4: While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 12%.
s.s5: While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 15%.

s.sd: Increases attack when your health is full.
Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
s.s1: While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 15 points.
s.s2: While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 20 points.
s.s3: While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 25 points.
s.s4: While active, increases attack power by 20% and increases defense by 30 points.
s.s5: While active, increases attack power by 30% and increases defense by 40 points.

s.sd: Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle. (This effect can stack twice.)
s.s1: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

s.sd: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).
Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.
s.s1: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

s.sd: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.
s.s1: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.

s.sd: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.
s.s1: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
s.s2: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

s.sd: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.
s.s1: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
s.s2: Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
s.s3: Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

s.sd: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.
Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.
Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.
Speeds up stamina recovery.
Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.
s.s1: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 30%.
s.s2: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 60%.
s.s3: Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

s.sd: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
Increases evade distance.
Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
s.s1: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
s.s2: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
s.s3: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
s.s4: Grearly decreases the imapct of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
s.s5: Massively decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

s.sd: Speeds up weapon sheating.
Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
s.s1: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
s.s2: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
s.s3: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius at 66% of their efficacy.
s.s4: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
s.s5: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

s.sd: Extends the duration of some item effects.
Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.
Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
s.s1: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
s.s2: Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
s.s3: Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

s.sd: Increases the damage of explosive items.
Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
s.s1: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
s.s2: Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
s.s3: Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

s.sd: Improves your skill at fishing.
s.s1: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

s.sd: Improves your skill at cooking meat.
s.s1: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

s.sd: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.
s.s1: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

s.sd: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.
s.s1: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

s.sd: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.
Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.
Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
s.s1: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
s.s2: While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
s.s3: While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

s.sd: Powers up Palicoes.
s.s1: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
s.s2: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
s.s3: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
s.s4: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
s.s5: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

s.sd: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
s.s1: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
s.s2: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
s.s3: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
s.s4: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

s.sd: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.
s.s1: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
s.s2: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
s.s3: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

s.sd: Increases affinity when stamina is full.
Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.
s.s1: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
s.s2: In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
s.s3: In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

s.sd: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
s.s1: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
s.s2: Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
s.s3: Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

s.sd: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
s.s2: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

s.sd: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.
Increases movement speed while crouching.
Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
Recover health when using sporepuffs.
Improves mobility in water.
s.s2: Prevents water from slowing movement and improves evasion while in water.
s.s3: Prevents water from slowing movement and greatly improves evasion while in water.

s.sd: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy.
s.s1: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

s.sd: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
s.s1: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

s.sd: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)
s.s1: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

s.sd: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.
s.s1: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
s.s2: Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
s.s3: Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

s.sd: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.
Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.
Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.
s.s1: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

s.sd: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.
s.s1: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

s.sd: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.
Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.
s.s1: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

s.sd: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.
Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)
s.s1: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
s.s2: Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
s.s3: Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

s.sd: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.
Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
Increases stamina cap.
Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.
Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.
Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.
s.s1: Raises base attack for non-elemental weapons.

s.sd: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joing mid-quest.)
Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).
Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
Negates all wind pressure.
Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joing mid-quest.)
Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest).
Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest).
Increases max bow charge level by one.
Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.
Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
